text: Ananya Panday (born 30 October 1998) is an Indian actress who works in Hindi films. She is the daughter of actor Chunky Pandey, She made her film debut with a leading role in the teen film Student of the Year 2, along with Tiger Shroff and Tara Sutaria. The latter also made her debut in films. She acted in the romantic comedy Pati Patni Aur Woh. For Student of The Year 2, she was credited well for her performances and she won multiple awards for that film. Category:Indian movie actors Category:1998 births Category:Living people
title: Ananya Panday
